channel.title: How the hell do you do that!
channel.description:
How come so many server are online 24/7 :eek:
I Cant do the following...
> Leave my PC on > Use MySQL > Pay for a VPS
is there anything I can do to get a free server host... something that will just host my server and keep the runserver.bat running?!
thanks, - toonshorty
*edit*
I Wonder if there is a HTML Script that would run it because a web host is 24/7 isnt it... and there free so if it is possible does anyone know a html script that will run my server?!

item.title: How the hell do you do that!
item.dc:creator: @InfoManiac InfoManiac
item.description:
@InfoManiac wrote:

50.00 USD = 25 GBP or so…

200.00 USD = 99.10 GBP or so…

Jay you are unbelieveably wrong…

SQL is just a program that you can use to further improve your server not host it… MySQL has NOTHING to do with hosting a server…
